body:
Thank you Axel and Greg !!!!
Congratulations for new implementation. I'll try it as soon as possible
in my class.

Thank you Thomas for the script that replaces the 'locations' dialog
(Sketchup Pro feature) on Google Sketchup.
It's welcome, besides I had overcome this, inputing it from Google
Earth.

regards,

vangelis




Em Seg, 2008-03-17 ?s 16:13 -0300,
